ISSUE.TITLE: VCF contact download on Third Party
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Feature Request Make the VCF download link available for third parties (Dolibarr 20.0.2) The VCF card download link is available for contacts, but apparently not for Thrid Parties (supplier) - at the least, there is no download link next to the name. ### Use case _No response_ ### Suggested implementation _No response_ ### Suggested steps _No response_
